title: My faith in the Dev team has been slightly restored
body:
If the new Riot Pls Video lives up to its promises, they will finally tackle the client and give us 2 factor authentification, the ability to stay logged in on the client and background patching as well as increase patching speed by, if their averages are true, 11 fucking times of what it currently is.

Riot, keep your word and in my eyes your Dev team will have earned a second chance. 

Also: Yes, I might be a bit late to this, but i've yet to see a post that expresses genuine grattitude for these changes being finally addressed.
